text: The Complete Solution Provider Features & Beneﬁ ts • High density and fully modular in a standalone form factor • All in one platform to handle video, audio, data transport needs • 1G/10G/25G WAN IP Network Support • Up to 4 I/O Minimodule can ﬁ t into the standalone frame • Up to 4 SFP Ports for Ethernet WAN IP Connectivity • Supports MSA SFP transceivers • Diverse signal Types such as 12G/6G/3G/HD/ASI, Ethernet, Serial Data, Intercom, HDMI, USB and Intercom • Main and Redundant Power • Onboard • 1G/10G/25G WAN IP Network Support • Onboard signal integrity and link analysis • Multiple control options including SNMP, Web Access, Panels and Magnum • Fanless operation with integrated heatsink for power dissipation The 3606FRS is a compact form factor, multi–service gateway capable of simultaneously transporting video, audio and data services over 1GbE/10GbE and 25GbE Ethernet WAN networks. Using Evertz' 3606 series of I/O mini– modules, the 3606FRS is highly ﬂ exible and can accommodate a multitude of signals including 12G single–link SDI, ethernet, MADI, AES, HDMI, intercom and serial data. The 3606FRS features encapsulation and de–encapsulation to IP over SMPTE2022–2, and SMPTE 2022–6. When combined with other compatible IP gateways including the 1RU 3606FR, the 3606FRS becomes part of an integrated, scaleable transport network with point–to–point, ring and hub–and–spoke conﬁ gurations enabling the sharing of content from different sites using different transport media. The 3606FRS possesses a small fanless form factor, and is designed to be operated in portable and/or low noise environments. The 3606FRS is ideal for mobile and live sports production applications.
